title: Mediterranean Pasta
description: Spaghetti pasta with seafood and spices, a specialty of the kitchen. Attention: Contains shrimp and other seafood!

title: House Pasta
description: Pasta with seafood and spices, a specialty of the kitchen. Attention: Contains shrimp and other seafood!

title: Chilli Pasta
description: Fettuccine pasta with chilli sauce and spices.

title: House Salad with Grilled Salmon
description: House salad (lettuce, arugula, carrot) with salmon.

title: Steak with Potatoes
description: Beef steak (150g) on the grill, with french fries. Served with rice and sauces.

title: Chopped Picanha with Vegetables and Pasta
description: 400g of chopped picanha, with grilled vegetables and pasta chosen by the customer.

title: Vegan Lasagna (Soy Meat)
description: 100% vegan lasagna made with soy meat and special pasta.

title: Special Salad
description: Salad with avocado, mango, lettuce, chickpeas, and much more.

title: Meatballs
description: Portion of meatballs with sour cream, onions, and seasonings. Served with rice or pasta.
